privatedomains-ifemailcontact:
Parameters:
* $1 - username to be contacted by email; supports GENDER
See also:
* {{msg-mw|privatedomains-emailadminlabel}} - label for "email domain" input box
saveprivatedomains-success:
Used as success message in [[Special:PrivateDomains]].

This message means "Changes of private domains has been saved (successfully)".
privatedomains-invalidemail:
Used as error message. Parameters:
* $1 - affiliate name
See also:
* {{msg-mw|privatedomains-affiliatenamelabel}} - label for "affiliate name" input box
privatedomains-instructions: Used as instruction message for the "domains" textarea in the "private domains" form in [[Special:PrivateDomains]].
